dmca.body:
________________________________

From: Amazing Counters [mailto:support@amazingcounters.com] 
Posted At: Thursday, June 22, 2006 4:21 AM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: DMCA Compaint
Subject: DMCA Compaint



ThePlanet.com Internet Services' Designated Agent:

 

You are hosting two sites, thefreehitcounter.com and yourhitcounter.com,
both at IP address 70.85.63.90, that are committing copyright
infringement of our copyrighted works.

 

Our site is AmazingCounters.com, it is copyrighted, and at all times it
has displayed a clearly visible copyright message.  Our site is
available on the Internet at http://www.amazingcounters.com.

 

In particular, the homepage http://www.thefreehitcounter.com has the
bulleted list and paragraph in the "Web Counters Information" section
that is copied from our site with minor modifications.  The questions
and answers in the Help page http://www.thefreehitcounter.com/help.php
are copied from our site with minor modifications.  The text on the sign
up / counter pages (http://www.thefreehitcounter.com/hit-counter.php,
http://www.thefreehitcounter.com/animal-counter.php,
http://www.thefreehitcounter.com/art-counter.php,
http://www.thefreehitcounter.com/sports-counter.php,
http://www.thefreehitcounter.com/odometer-counter.php,
http://www.thefreehitcounter.com/tech-counter.php,
http://www.thefreehitcounter.com/cool.php,
http://www.thefreehitcounter.com/colorful-counter.php,
http://www.thefreehitcounter.com/language-counter.php,
http://www.thefreehitcounter.com/ocassion-counter.php,
http://www.thefreehitcounter.com/lcd-counter.php,
http://www.thefreehitcounter.com/scary-counter.php,
http://www.thefreehitcounter.com/wacky-counter.php,
http://www.thefreehitcounter.com/basic-counter.php and
http://www.thefreehitcounter.com/creative-counter.php) is copied from
our site with minor modifications.

 

The text paragraph at the top of
http://www.thefreehitcounter.com/advertise.php is copied from our site
with minor modifications.

 

The above urls include virtually every page of their site.

 

In addition to the copied text, our original copyrighted counter styles
(graphic images) have been copied directly without modification as well.
These are relatively easy to identify compared to styles they have that
were not copied from us, because they currently show the same unique
sequence of numbers (92031475) used by our site and their other styles
use the standard sequence (0123456789).  Of particular note, most of the
images on http://www.thefreehitcounter.com/animal-counter.php and
http://www.thefreehitcounter.com/sports-counter.php are ones that have
been copied without permission from our site.

 

There are also high level indications that the entire site was based on
our design, with some subsequent modification.  For example, their use
of an introductory paragraph, the all upper case SAMPLE WEB COUNTERS,
the bulleted list, etc. are all taken from our unique design.  Likewise,
they use very similar categorization of counter styles as ours, which no
other site has, including very unique category designations like
"Creative", "Colorful", "Artistic", "Scary", "Weird and Wacky", etc.

 

In addition, yourhitcounter.com contains very similar instances of
copyright infringmenet.  Of particular note are the content of the FAQ
page (http://www.yourhitcounter.com/help.php) and the counter style
graphic images with the 92031475 sequence on
http://www.yourhitcounter.com/animal-counter.php and
http://www.yourhitcounter.com/sports-counter.php.

 

It is requested that you expeditiously remove or disable access to the
material that is infringing on our copyrights.

 

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials
described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized
by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

 

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the
notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am
authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is
allegedly infringed.

 

Michael Kovarik

 

AmazingCounters.com

support@amazingcounters.com
